resources.string: keeping your baby safe and cared for, so you can relax
Almost there, just a few more steps
List of calming music for the baby
List of educational stories in Arabic and English

Main Features



User Profile Creation:


 Allow parents and caregivers to create personalized profiles.


 Emergency Contact:



Easy and quick contact with support, emergency services, or designated contacts.


 Sound Detection:


 Continuous monitoring of the environment for relevant audio notifications, focusing on baby cries.


 Real-time Analysis:


 Identifies and classifies baby cries effectively and quickly using an ML model on the mobile device.

 Noise cancellation techniques to recognize the child’s voice within disturbances.


 Alert Generation:


 Instant alerts and notifications to the parent or guardian when the baby cries.

 Contact emrgency parent when alerts arent being responded to


 Additional Features


 Kids Activities:


 Engaging activities designed to entertain and educate children.


 Sleep Tracking:


 Monitors and records the baby’s sleep patterns.

 Provides insights and recommendations for improving sleep quality.


 Tips and Tricks:


 Helpful advice and tips for parents on various aspects of child care.
